text: Gerdy Troost was the owner of the dog "Harras" a male German Shepard. Harras reportedly was the male dog who impregnated Hitler's female German Shepard Blondi. Blondi would go on to have 5 puppies. During the ending of Nazi Germany Hitler had Blondi and her puppies killed. Hitler had Blondi killed to test if a cyanide pill would work on himself and her puppies were killed to prevent them being taken by the Soviets. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Nazi Party
title: Gerdy Troost
